titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the Department of Housing and Urban Development should not interfere with the exercise of the right of free speech, the right of free association, or the right to petition the Government for a redress of grievances.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1922-1923)
Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

term.name: Department of Housing and Urban Development

bill.summary: 9/22/1994--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Department of Housing and Urban Development should not interfere with the exercise of the right of free speech, the right of free association, or the right to petition the Government for a redress of grievances.
